auth_hero.usage: Right side of Login/Register page, full height, object-cover

dashboard_welcome.usage: Small avatar or welcome banner in Dashboard

pos_placeholder.usage: Background or empty state for POS

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px, size 20px for UI, 24px for Nav

auth.layout: Split Screen (50/50 on Desktop, 100% Form on Mobile)
auth.visuals: Left: Clean Form with Logo. Right: High-quality image with a dark overlay and a testimonial quote.
auth.quote: "Gérer mes boutiques n'a jamais été aussi simple." - Fatou D., CEO

dashboard.layout: Sidebar Navigation (Collapsible on mobile). Main Content: Bento Grid.

widgets.stats: Simple cards with Icon + Label + Big Number + Trend Indicator (Green/Red)
widgets.charts: Use Recharts. Minimalist lines/bars. No grid lines if possible. Tooltip on hover.

dashboard.sidebar: Dark mode sidebar by default for contrast, or match theme. Let's match theme but use a subtle background color difference (e.g., bg-slate-50 in light mode for main content, white for sidebar).

pos.layout: Two Columns. Left (65%): Product Grid with Images. Right (35%): Cart & Checkout.
pos.interaction: Touch-optimized. Big buttons for 'Add to Cart'. Clear 'Pay' button in Orange.
pos.features: Quick search bar at top. Category filter pills.

products.layout: Data Table with Filters. Use Shadcn Table.
products.actions: Primary Action: 'Add Product' (Top Right). Bulk actions on selection.

ai_features.rh_ia: Clean document preview area. 'Generate' button should have a subtle 'sparkle' icon or gradient border.
ai_features.marketing_ia: Split view: Input form vs. Live Preview of the ad.

universal_guidelines.language: All text MUST be in French.
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios. Use aria-labels for icon-only buttons.
universal_guidelines.responsive: Mobile-first. Stack grids on mobile. Hide non-essential columns in tables on small screens.
universal_guidelines.dark_mode: Use 'dark:' classes for all color definitions. Test toggle frequently.
universal_guidelines.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
